subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Clint Dempsey scored twice as Fulham rallied to beat Manchester City, 3-1, in the English Premier League. The victory lifted Fulham to eighth place, just a point behind West Ham in the final European qualification spot. In another match, the American goalkeepers Brad Friedel and Tim Howard each allowed three goals as Aston Villa tied Everton, 3-3.
